projects.title: Online Portfolio
projects.description: What you're seeing right now is my own online portfolio, containing links to my social media accounts, skillsets and samples of projects that are representative of my current skills.

projects.title: SwissAPO
projects.description:
SwissAPO stands for Swiss Association of Professional Organizers, and they are the largest team of professional organizers in Switzerland.
They hired me to develop their new website and their main concern was to have a more fresh and easy on the eyes user interface, elements that lacked in the previous platform.
During development, I used a very simple tech stack because they wanted to keep everything very simple along with the ability of being able to manage their own content via a CMS (Content Management System).

projects.title: Film in Piazza - Intro
projects.description: Film in Piazza is a young group of friends and film lovers. Every year they follow very closely the Locarno Film Festival, uploading daily vlogs and movie reviews on their social media platforms. I was commissioned to create an intro to be used at the beginning of their videos and this is the final result. I wanted to create something slightly resambling the Disney Pixar lamp intro, but using elements from the movie industry world.
projects.presentation: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FWUztyZtst4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.title: Film in Piazza - Editing
projects.description: Film in Piazza is a young group of friends and film lovers. Every year they follow very closely the Locarno Film Festival, uploading daily vlogs and movie reviews on their social media platforms. For them, not only I have created an intro for their videos, but have also did some editing work. Here’s a playlist of videos I worked on.

projects.title: Teleticino - Index
projects.description: Teleticino is a local television channel based in Melide (Ticino, CH). Some years ago, I worked there for a few months as a graphic designer intern and during that time I created an intro for "Index", a format they were in the process of rebranding. I did all the modeling and main animations in Cinema 4D and all the further editing and compositing in After Effects. It wasn't technically difficult, but I remember we went through a couple of revisions because we wanted to make it right.
projects.presentation: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5P8-UoY_KGQ" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.title: Teleticino - Piazza del Corriere
projects.description: Teleticino is a local television channel based in Melide (Ticino, CH). Some years ago, I worked there for a few months as a graphic designer intern and during that time I created an intro for "Piazza del Corriere" a format they were in the process of rebranding. Everything was created using After Effects and I learned a couple of nice perspective tricks from the graphic designer I assisted during my internship!
projects.presentation: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fp_73DgKr04" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.title: Laboratorio di Cucina Naturale
projects.description:
The "Laboratorio di Cucina Naturale" is a food catering service which specializes in natural and mediterrian food. I was hired to develop a new website and their brief was to make something nicer than their old website, but also easily manageable and with an ecommerce.
 In these cases, I always go with Wordpress, because it's a CMS I know quite well, and which is perfect for such situations.

projects.title: USIGeek
projects.description:
USIGeek is a student association of the Università della Svizzera italiana (USI) with the goal of sharing passions and interests about entartainment and technology.
I created this website completely spontaneously because I wanted to put my React skills to practice with some new topics I had just learned, and I didn't like their previous platform.
I'm really happy with how it turned out, especially because it's the first time I make a multi-language website from scratch using a non-monolithic approach.
